events.description: (:38) 71-C.Fleming reported in as eligible.  12-T.Brady kneels to PIT 43 for -1 yards. Patriots 9th Super Bowl appearance, most all-time (Broncos, Cowboys & Steelers, 8). Patriots 31st postseason win, 4th-most all-time (GB, 33, Dallas, 34 & Pitt 35). NE-12 Bradys 7th conference championship, most all-time (Lodish, 6). Bill Belichick 7th conference championship, most by head coach in NFL history (Shula, 6).  Robert Kraft's 8th conference championship, most in NFL history (Bowlen, 7).

Patriots 31st postseason win, 4th-most all-time (GB, 33, Dallas, 34 & Pitt 35). NE-12 Bradys 7th conference championship, most all-time (Lodish, 6). Bill Belichick 7th conference championship, most by head coach in NFL history (Shula, 6).  Robert Kraft's 8th conference championship, most in NFL history (Bowlen, 7).

events.description: END GAME
events.alt_description: END GAME
